page.title: 10THE SCHOOL IN WARDOUR
page.content:
Our school is over{200 years}old.A history book of Wardour says it used to be a{boarding school.}Later the teaching staff were the{Sisters of {Charity}of the order of St Vincent de Paul. The sisters left in 1964. The school is made of{stone}and it has a{cross}on the top.We can still see the marks on the walls from the children sharpening their{slate {pencils. Some people used to walk for miles all the way from{Ansty}and places quite far away.Just by the door there is a {boot scraper}because after the children's long walk to school they needed to scrape all the snow and mud off their boots.
Josephine Bell Camilla Clark
